Version 1.2

Added:

  • New way to position HUD window.

    Captin can position HUD window centered on screen in horizontal or vertical direction, Or, set an offset for HUD window in horizontal or vertical direction.

Improved:

  • Captin is now notarized by Apple.
  • HUD can be placed on any position on screen, including menu bar.

Fixed:

  • Compatibility issue on macOS Ventura.

Version 1.1.7

Fixed:

  • Do not show input method change notification repeatedly.

Version 1.1.6

Fixed:

  • Caps lock status is changed to off when the user switches to another input method.

Updated:

  • Display information for compatibility.

Version 1.1.5

Fixed:

  • Issue on some models that can not get display preview info.
For issue or question about our app, please mail us: support@100hps.com
